text: @realDonaldTrump People don’t get it! I see Trump support saying more die of flu a year. U don’t know that yet but think on this.. between 200k and 650k die of flu annually and that’s WITH a vaccine. Covid-19 is a raging wildfire with no fire department! The 1st world struggle with that concept!
